objects.text:
• German Polycarbonate Shell
• 8-Wheel Silent Technology
• Built-in USB Charging Port
• TSA Approved Smart Lock

product_details.description: Accessibility just made a move to the next level. No cap. Our classic Cabin Luggage has now evolved! The Cabin Pro is designed for quick access to help you breeze through security. UNDESTRUCTABLE GERMAN MARKLON POLYCARBONATE SHELL: Casing: Hard LIGHTWEIGHT & INDUSTRY BEST STORAGE: Capacity: 40liter, Weight: 3.65 grams, Dimension : 57.8 x 37 x 24.3 cm SILENT RUN JAPANESE WHEEL TECHNOLOGY: Number of wheels: 8, Super Smooth Hinomoto Wheels THE MOST FEATURE RICH LUGGAGE: USB Port: 1, Powerbank not included, Lock Type: TSA Number Lock, Comes with magic eraser, Dust Bag & Laundry Bag Water resistant: Yes Outer material - Polycarbonate ** Water resistance level - Water Resistant **

banner_details:
This banner design promotes premium travel luggage with a sleek and modern layout. It consists of four visually distinct quadrants split diagonally with dark green (#2D4B2F, #1A2C1C), deep olive (#3E5C40), and vibrant yellow (#F0C808) backgrounds overlaid by a semi-transparent white line grid. At the top-left corner, a bold white uppercase heading ("heading") sits above a yellow techno-style subheading ("subheading"), conveying product identity. Below that, a clean, futuristic tagline ("tagline") summarizes the offering. A centrally placed high-quality product image ("product_image") dominates the right half. Key selling points are listed in the lower-left text block ("description"), followed by the product price in bold ("price"). A rectangular dark green CTA button ("cta_background") with white text ("cta") encourages interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Green: #2D4B2F  
- Deep Forest Green: #1A2C1C  
- Olive Green: #3E5C40  
- Vibrant Yellow: #F0C808  
- Light Grey Grid: #E8E8E8  
- White: #FFFFFF  
- Dark Text: #2D2D2D
product_color: The product image showcases a sleek, modern suitcase in a refined dark olive green (#4A5A41) base color, complemented by a vivid mustard yellow (#F2B233) accent that adds energy and style. The yellow highlights appear on the zipper tracks and interior lining, creating dynamic contrast and guiding the viewer’s attention across the design. The matte black (#1D1D1B) handle and corner wheels blend seamlessly without overpowering the main colors, maintaining a clean, focused look. The yellow grid interior lining introduces subtle texture. For an advertisement banner, a palette of dark olive green, mustard yellow, matte black, and soft beige (#F2F2E9) will be visually compelling.
